Title: Blind Spot
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Wendy Calhoun, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan and Ava survive a hitman's attack, and Raylan suspects that the Crowder family is trying to get revenge on Ava. But are his own biases clouding his judgment?
